extendedInfo.description: Some guys just need a little help breaking the ice with the girl across the room. This app will help you overcome your problem. In a bar or a night club, not sure what to say? Get that date or phone number with the Magic 8-Ball Pick-Up Line Predictor!The Magic 8-Ball for Guys (Vol 1) has been mystically transformed into a Pick-Up line Predictor to help you score. What should you say to girl to get her attention? Talk about love, her beautiful eyes, hot body, fashionable clothes - or  whip out your phone and run this Magic Mystical Pick-Up Line App to get the best advice - An amazing pick-up line!Just run this app, give it shake or two and there's your Magic Mystical Pick-Up Line!(If she laughs, shake it again and tell her another one!)Disclaimer: These Pick-Up Lines are random and for fun only, this app should not be used to make serious life or relationship decisions - but you may get laugh out of a hot babe to break the ice...
